metadata.topic_title: Smart Card and PIV Credential Revocation

active_learning.discussion_prompt: Compare CRL and OCSP for PIV credential revocation. What are the trade-offs in terms of speed, security, and scalability? Debate when to use each in personnel offboarding scenarios, addressing misconceptions about real-time revocation.
